inputs.title: Collect Kubernetes metrics
inputs.description: Collecting API Server, Controller Manager, Scheduler, Proxy and Event metrics as well as Node, Pod, Container, Volume and System metrics from Kubelet and metrics from kube_state_metrics (container, cronjob, deployment, daemonset, node, persistentvolume, persistentvolumeclaim, pod, replicaset, resourcequota, service, statefulset, storageclass).
